ygData.subject: Re: Re: Banshee Aura, Restless Bones
ygData.msgSnippet: As A L16 Gnome nec can I enter the home city of Dark Elves and proceed to 3d gate and purchase spells w/o being KOS?  Also, is the book Dark Binding, the one
ygData.messageBody:
As A L16 Gnome nec can I enter the home city of Dark Elves and proceed to 3d
gate and purchase spells w/o being KOS? Also, is the book Dark Binding, the
one used for research in Necro spells, if not what is its name? To get there I
assume its the boat, get off at human port, and head North to Dark Elf city?



At 12:52 PM 7/13/99 -0400, you wrote:
>
> Banshee AUra can occasionally be found in Grobb, although you usually have to
> research that spell. Restless Bones can be found in Grobb, although Verant
> changes spells locations around and it's been awhile since I was level 20.
> Spirit Armor simply adds armor to your class and is a pretty good spell.
> The 3 dots do roughly 450-500 damage. As for the pet the best way to use one
> in dungeons is not to use one :).
>
> Naeeldark Dark Elf Necromancer of the 31st Circle
